Articles.Content: I think KSP needs a way to terraform and now with 0.23.5 when the added asteorids then we can terraform them! Examples would be 1 time use gravity enhancer to increase your asteroids gravity or size enhancers to make it bigger and even air pumps to give it an atmosphere! However for atmospheres you need to get to an planet with an atmosphere (Kerbin) and pump it in your ship to deposit at your asteroid! But when catching Jools atmosphere bad things will happen...
